_annotationBlock.description: Mock data server for WorldChef PoC providing consistent JSON API endpoints for both Flutter and React Native projects.
_annotationBlock.purpose_statement: Serves identical mock recipe data to both PoC implementations with configurable response times and CORS support for fair comparison testing.
key_logic_points: Uses json-server for RESTful API simulation
CORS enabled for cross-origin requests from mobile apps
Schema versioning in JSON data for compatibility tracking
Simple Express.js server for custom middleware support

interfaces_provided.name: REST API
interfaces_provided.details: RESTful endpoints for recipe data (GET /recipes, GET /recipes/:id)
interfaces_provided.notes: Default port 3000, configurable base URL, JSON responses

requisites.description: npm or yarn for package management

external_dependencies.name: json-server
external_dependencies.reason: Simple REST API server for serving mock JSON data

external_dependencies.name: cors
external_dependencies.reason: CORS middleware for cross-origin requests from mobile apps

external_dependencies.name: express
external_dependencies.reason: Web framework for custom middleware and server configuration

quality_notes.manual_review_comment: Mock server configured with 50 recipes, response time middleware, and CORS support. Ready for integration testing.
